mapper.select: SELECT id FROM Masterpiece WHERE writer = #{memberId}

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.writer, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickName, f.fileName as newFileName, COUNT(d.id) discussionCount, (SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM File WHERE p.masterpieceId = p.id)) hasFile FROM Masterpiece p JOIN Member m ON p.writer = m.id LEFT JOIN Discussion d ON p.id = d.masterpieceId LEFT JOIN File f ON p.id = f.masterpieceId GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY p.id DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{items}
SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.writer, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickName FROM Masterpiece p JOIN Member m ON p.writer = m.id ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.writer, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickName FROM Masterpiece p JOIN Member m ON p.writer = m.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Masterpiece (title, content, writer, country, artist, age, color, masterpiece) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{country}, #{artist}, #{age}, #{color}, #{masterpiece})
mapper.update: UPDATE Masterpiece SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, country = #{country}, artist = #{artist}, age = #{age}, color = #{color}, masterpiece = #{masterpiece}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
